strings.Value: "The Stag Lord drew the short straw with his old man. It's better to be an orphan than born to such a house! Ha, ha, hmm."
"There are no worse tyrants than cruel parents. And there wasn't a more powerless and unhappy creature than their child."
"I can never understand how seeing a helpless and fragile creature can inspire a wish to beat them, rather than protect and help them."
"That's the cruelty of life. No one hurts us more than those who are closest to us."
